sqlMap.select: SELECT TABLE_NAME,COMMENTS FROM USER_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = #BMC#

SELECT T1.TABLE_NAME AS BMC,T1.COLUMN_NAME AS ZDMC , T1.DATA_TYPE AS ZDLX, T1.DATA_LENGTH AS ZDCD,T1.DATA_PRECISION AS DATA_P,T1.DATA_SCALE AS DATA_S,NVL(T4.CONSTRAINT_TYPE,'YB') AS ZDXZ,T2.COMMENTS AS ZDZS ,T1.COLUMN_ID AS SX FROM USER_TAB_COLS T1 LEFT JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS T2 ON T2.TABLE_NAME=T1.TABLE_NAME AND T2.COLUMN_NAME=T1.COLUMN_NAME LEFT JOIN USER_CONS_COLUMNS T3 ON T1.TABLE_NAME = T3.TABLE_NAME AND T1.COLUMN_NAME = T3.COLUMN_NAME LEFT JOIN USER_CONSTRAINTS T4 ON T3.CONSTRAINT_NAME = T4.CONSTRAINT_NAME WHERE T1.TABLE_NAME= #BMC# AND (T4.CONSTRAINT_TYPE IS NULL OR T4.CONSTRAINT_TYPE IN ('P','R','C')) ORDER BY SX

SELECT DISTINCT(T1.COLUMN_NAME) AS ZBZD,T1.TABLE_NAME AS ZBMC ,T3.TABLE_NAME AS WBMC,T3.COLUMN_NAME AS WBZD FROM USER_CONS_COLUMNS T1,USER_CONSTRAINTS T2, (SELECT T2.TABLE_NAME,T2.COLUMN_NAME,T1.R_CONSTRAINT_NAME FROM USER_CONSTRAINTS T1,USER_CONS_COLUMNS T2 WHERE T1.R_CONSTRAINT_NAME=T2.CONSTRAINT_NAME AND T1.TABLE_NAME=#ZBMC# ) T3 WHERE T1.CONSTRAINT_NAME=T2.CONSTRAINT_NAME AND T2.R_CONSTRAINT_NAME=T3.R_CONSTRAINT_NAME AND T1.TABLE_NAME= #ZBMC# AND T1.COLUMN_NAME= #ZBZD#
